languages.text: Паломник искренне благодарит Вольного Торговца за встречу и предлагает обдумать его предложение.

traits.locale_text: Паломник искренне благодарит Вольного Торговца за встречу и предлагает обдумать его предложение.

languages.text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.
languages.original_text: Паломник искренне благодарит Вольного Торговца за встречу и предлагает обдумать его предложение.

traits.locale_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader and promises to fully remunerate {mf|his|her} generosity.
The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader and promises to fully remunerate {mf|his|her} generosity.
The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader and promises to fully remunerate {mf|his|her} generosity.

The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.
The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.

languages.text: 朝圣者真诚地感谢行商浪人接受这次会面，希望行商浪人能考虑他的提议。
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.

traits.locale_text: 朝圣者诚挚地感谢行商浪人，承诺将郑重酬谢{mf|他|她}的慷慨。

languages.text: El Peregrino da las gracias a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente por la reunión y pide que se tenga en cuenta su oferta.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.

traits.locale_text: El Peregrino da las gracias a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y promete remunerar plenamente su generosidad.

languages.text: 巡礼者はローグトレーダーとの出会いに心から感謝し、彼の申し出を考慮するよう求める。
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.

traits.locale_text: 巡礼者はローグトレーダーに心から感謝し、厚意に十分報いることを約束する。

languages.text: Der Pilger dankt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} für dieses Treffen und bittet {mf|ihn|sie}, über das Angebot nachzudenken.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.

traits.locale_text: Der Pilger dankt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} für dieses Treffen und bittet {mf|ihn|sie}, über das Angebot nachzudenken.

languages.text: Le Pèlerin remercie sincèrement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour cette rencontre et {mf|le|la} prie de bien vouloir prendre son offre en considération.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.

traits.locale_text: Le Pèlerin remercie sincèrement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour cette rencontre et {mf|le|la} prie de bien vouloir prendre son offre en considération.

languages.text: Hacı, Hür Tacir'e bu görüşme için içtenlikle teşekkür ediyor ve teklifinin dikkate alınmasını rica ediyor.
languages.original_text: The Pilgrim sincerely thanks the Rogue Trader for this meeting and asks that his offer be considered.
